page.title: 19ATTITUDES
page.content: OUR SURVEY DISCOVERED THE MAJORITY OF PEOPLE LIKED WOODLEY. OUTSIDERS FIND IT DIFFICULT TO UNDERSTAND THE LAYOUT AS MANY HOUSES ARE VERY SIMILAR.LOTS OF PEOPLE COMPLAINED ABOUT DOGS BARKING.THE MAJORITY PREFERED HEDGED GARDENS OVER OPEN PLAN.ALMOST ALL THE PEOPLE LIKED THE SCHOOLS IN THIS AREA. MANY DID NOT LIKE THE NEW HOUSING DEVELOPMENT. MANY DID NOT LIKE THE PUNKS,WHO MEET ROUND THE SHOPPING TELEPHONE KIOSK,PARK AND CAR PARKS.A LOT THOUGHT THE NEW MINI ROUNDABOUTS WERE DANGEROUS.MOST PEOPLE THINK THE BUS SERVICE IN TO READING IS QUITE GOOD, BECAUSE IT RUNS EVERY HALF HOUR. MOST PEOPLE THINK THAT IT IS A GOOD LAW THAT YOU CAN'T CYCLE IN THE SHOPPING CENTRE.MANY PEOPLE THINK THAT B.M.X. BIKES ARE DANGEROUS ON THE ROAD, BECAUSE SOME PEOPLE RIDE CARELESSLY.
